descriptions: No attempt to organize data or data is completely disorganized and incomprehensible.
Data is poorly organized with significant errors or omissions. Difficult to interpret.
Data is somewhat organized, but contains several errors or omissions, hindering interpretation.
Data is generally organized with minor errors or omissions. Interpretation is possible with some effort.
Data is well-organized with minimal errors. Easy to interpret and draw conclusions.
Data is exceptionally well-organized, accurate, and presented in a clear, concise manner. Interpretation is effortless.
No attempt to represent data, or representation is completely inappropriate and misleading.
Representation is poorly chosen and significantly distorts the data. Difficult to understand.
Representation is somewhat appropriate but contains flaws that hinder understanding.
Representation is generally appropriate but could be improved for clarity.
Representation is appropriate and clearly displays the data.
Representation is exceptionally clear, insightful, and enhances understanding of the data.
No attempt to interpret the data or interpretation is completely incorrect.
Interpretation demonstrates a very limited understanding of the data.
Interpretation demonstrates a partial understanding of the data but contains significant errors.
Interpretation demonstrates a basic understanding of the data but lacks depth or insight.
Interpretation is accurate and demonstrates a good understanding of the data and its implications.
Interpretation is insightful, comprehensive, and demonstrates a deep understanding of the data, drawing valid and well-supported conclusions.
Unable to answer any questions about the data.
Answers few questions, and most are incorrect.
Answers some questions with limited accuracy.
Answers most questions correctly with some minor errors.
Answers all questions correctly and completely.
Answers all questions correctly, completely, and provides insightful explanations.
